name: Running
description: It doesn't have to make sense. RUN.

evolutions.name: Running2
evolutions.description: It doesn't have to make sense. RUN2.

evolutions.name: Running3
evolutions.description: It doesn't have to make sense. RUN3.

evolutions.name: Advanced Pullups
evolutions.description: Grasp the bar with all your might and push your limits to the next level.

evolutions.name: Master Pullups
evolutions.description: Perfect form, relentless drive. You're a pull-up machine.

name: Wing-Chun Dummy Training
description: While it stands stoic and strong, it also stands idle and foolish, never knowing the joy of victory or the wisdom of failure.

evolutions.name: Wing-Chun Dummy Mastery
evolutions.description: The dummy stands no chance against your fluid movements and strong strikes.

evolutions.name: Wing-Chun Dummy Grandmaster
evolutions.description: You've transcended beyond the basics, embodying the spirit of Wing-Chun.

evolutions.name: Heavy Squats
evolutions.description: Lift more, grow stronger. The weight is but a number.

evolutions.name: Squat God
evolutions.description: You squat with such power and grace that the gods would be envious.

evolutions.name: Deadlift Powerhouse
evolutions.description: You've graduated from novice to powerhouse, deadlifting weights that would make others quake.

evolutions.name: Deadlift Titan
evolutions.description: You are a titan among mortals, lifting weights others can only dream of.

name: Concentrate energy ball
description: Harness your energy into a concentrated sphere.

evolutions.name: Energize
evolutions.description: Your control over your energy balls grows, turning them into devastating weapons.

evolutions.name: Energize Master
evolutions.description: You've mastered energy manipulation, allowing you to create incredibly powerful energy balls.

name: Fly 10 feet
description: Take to the skies and learn to fly.

evolutions.name: Soar
evolutions.description: You've begun to master flight, allowing you to fly faster and higher.

evolutions.name: Soar Master
evolutions.description: You're now a master of flight, able to fly as freely as a bird.

name: Manipulate energy aura
description: Learn to manipulate your aura, the energy that surrounds you.

evolutions.name: Aura Mastery
evolutions.description: Your mastery over your aura is growing, making it stronger and more resilient.

evolutions.name: Aura Grandmaster
evolutions.description: You are now a grandmaster, with complete control over your aura.

name: Force shielding
description: Create an invisible shield to protect you from attacks.

evolutions.name: Shield Reinforcement
evolutions.description: Strengthen your shield, making it nearly impervious to attacks.

evolutions.name: Shield Perfection
evolutions.description: Your shield is now perfect, able to withstand any attack.

name: Projected energy blasting
description: Learn to project your energy as a powerful blast.

evolutions.name: Blast Mastery
evolutions.description: Your energy blasts are now more powerful and accurate.

evolutions.name: Blast Grandmaster
evolutions.description: As a grandmaster, your energy blasts are now unstoppable forces of destruction.
